actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to stimulate the conversion to wide-spread use of fuel-efficient gasohol mixes by providing a financial incentive to States and localities which convert all or part of their automotive fleets to such mixes.
short_title: Public Vehicle Gasohol Incentive Act of 1979

summary.text: Public Vehicle Gasohol Incentive Act of 1979 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish a program of grants to States for converting State-owned motor vehicles to the use of gasohol. Requires the State to certify to the Secretary the number of such vehicles converted to be eligible for incentive payments. Authorizes appropriations of $125,000,000 for fiscal year 1980 out of the Highway Trust Fund to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: Public Vehicle Gasohol Incentive Act of 1979

A bill to stimulate the conversion to wide-spread use of fuel-efficient gasohol mixes by providing a financial incentive to States and localities which convert all or part of their automotive fleets to such mixes.
